name: Baba Fumika
intro: Gravure magazines since she was featured there often back in 2015
description: That rack, dude. And her acting ain't half bad considering she isn't that into gravure and is a regular at local TV drama now.
wantedLevelComment: Purely because of rack and face
comments: *She is more commonly referred to as Fumi-chan
**She did sing a song before for a producer and it wasn't bad, see this music video

name: Tachibana Haru
dobComment: If I'm not wrong should be*
intro: From mobile game "Alternative Girls" official livestream series "OruKomi"
description: I can't say I want to f**k her, but she'll never hear of that haha. She'll make a good girlfriend though, as conflicting as we may be in personality maybe sorry for insulting your avatar in your livestream!! (>w<)
wantedLevelComment: Outside of female seiyuu
comments: *Fans inferred her age from when she graduated from university, in 2017
**I reviewed her 3rd photobook and her final for Comiket here

name: Hanazawa Kana
intro: From Anime "OreImo" as Kuroneko or earlier in "Kannagi" as Zange-chan
description: Kana-chan has been in so many roles, you're weird if you didn't like her because of one of them.
wantedLevelComment: That voice can save lives
comments: *The closest she has come to it was wearing one, specifically just the top with a shirt above, on her 400th episode of her radio program
**Married to fellow voice actor Oono Kensho

name: Hikasa Youko
intro: From Anime "K-ON!" as Akiyama Mio, "Seitokai Yakuindomo" as Amakusa Shino, and later in her solo singer career
description: I like her voice thanks to the one Anime "K-ON!", but also because of that do I get exposed to how interesting she is* in front of the camera.
wantedLevelComment: Since it's only the voice
comments: *She is a senpai in most live events, and is normally targeted for her age in recent years with all the newbies around

name: Horie Yui
dobComment: lol you don't want to know so it's ALWAYS 17 years ago**
intro: From Anime "Love Hina" as Narusegawa Naru and "Toradora!" as Kushieda Minori
description: On camera she is very kind (regardless of age), and technically her face is still attractive for her age
wantedLevelComment: Purely because of her unique voice
comments: *Have we ever? More like, do we want to now?
**Okay I'm going to reveal it, you ready? It's 1976.09.20

name: Kayano Ai
intro: Because she's cute? And later from Anime "Hyouka" as Chitanda Eru
description: One of those few who I followed because she looks cute, and subsequently I've came to love her voice acting and singing too.
wantedLevelComment: Overall package, face and all
comments: *Pity, isn't it?

name: Komatsu Mikako
intro: From Anime "Kamisama Inai no Nichiyoubi" as Princess Ulla Eulesse Hecmatika, and specifically the ending theme song
description: She must be the perfect girl next door, from early days posting selfies on Twitter** to her music career, she has all the talent.
wantedLevelComment: The perfect older sister
comments: *To fellow voice actor Maeno Tomoaki
**Here's an example of what she posted on one particular Valentine's Day

name: Kotobuki Minako
intro: From Anime "K-ON!" as Kotobuki Tsumugi and later in "A-Channel" as Yuuko
description: Having a distinctive lovely voice, she has starred in many roles who will make an impression. Her music career has also been loved by me over the years as she continues to grow. Her half-naked is just bonus.
wantedLevelComment: Overall awesomeness, but the age...
comments: *Not yet, and that might be a good thing hehe

name: Ookubo Rumi
intro: Because she's cute, and from Anime "Servant x Service" as Ichimiya Touko
description: With the perfect tsundere** voice acting and a really cute face even at her age, she is to be loved for everything she has to offer.
wantedLevelComment: Outside of Anime her is so underrated
comments: *Read as "RumiRumi"
**Hot-cold personality specifically towards love

name: Satou Satomi
intro: From Anime "K-ON!" as Tainaka Ritsu, and later in "Seitokai Yakuindomo" as Shichijou Aria
description: Hyper voice Satomi-chan is the best, whether it is from Anime, or in her singing career. Nobody comes close in this aspect and I love her for this.
wantedLevelComment: Purely because of hyped Satomi-chan
comments: *Commonly referred to as "Shugami" because of her name, amongst other nicknames given
**Inactive as of 2017
***Married to fellow voice actor Terashima Takuma

name: Taketatsu Ayana
intro: From Anime "K-ON!" as Nakano Azusa and later in Anime "OreImo" as Kousaka Kirino
description: I wish I could point out more bad stuff about her but apart from her less than skilled singing everything about her is great. And she has a rack too. You don't need her Anime roles with this real life equivalent.
wantedLevelComment: Overrated in popularity but I like
comments: *Technically yes in her 2nd photobook with a thin shirt, and yes later in an event-only photobook as seen on Twitter here
**Married to fellow voice actor Kaji Yuki

name: Tomatsu Haruka
intro: From Anime "Kannagi" as Nagi and later from idol group "sphere"
description: She is real perfect all around in looks and talent despite the lack of a chest, her roles in Anime are diverse yet professionally voiced. I want to switch my same year elder sister with her haha
wantedLevelComment: So popular and perfect, she might not be my type to love
comments: *Also referred to as "Haru-chan" by other members in her idol group "sphere"
**Appeared half-naked in photobooks the highest amount of times among all the voice actresses mentioned here

name: Toyosaki Aki
intro: From Anime "K-ON!" as Hirasawa Yui and "Hatsukoi Limited." as Bessho Koyoi
description: You'll know her when she appears in Anime* (arguably over Hanazawa Kana), and I have loved her everything** for the duration of her solo music career before she was married. Today her is still my definition of cute, as jovial as a veteran she may be.
wantedLevelComment: This unwavering love for her...
comments: *The first exception to this was from Anime "Fractale" when she voiced a matured woman and was totally different from her usual voice. It threw me off the wall and beyond but I still liked it too
**Don't mind her height though; Being tall wasn't her choice

name: Yuuki Aoi
intro: From Taketatsu Ayana in idol unit "petit milady", and later in Anime "A Channel" as Tooru
description: A master and child prodigy in voice acting**, she voices a myriad of roles from where you will least expect her, and her age is not truly reflective of her easy-going personality and cute appearance. My love for her grew slowly but surely over the years and today she deserves my respect.
wantedLevelComment: Not exactly my type but she is lovely
comments: *More commonly referred to as "Ao-chan"
**Today I learnt she was in the original AND remake of Anime "Kino no Tabi", premier aired on 2003.04.08 [17 years ago] and 2017.10.06 [2 years ago] respectively

name: Amamiya Sora
intro: From Anime "Isshukan Friends." as Fujimiya Kaori
description: That same year waifu I want but cannot get. She is well-mannered, rather serious, but cute and sometimes sadistic it makes her fellow group members from TrySail scared. If you feel that she is in a different level than us you're not alone.
wantedLevelComment: Because I wish she was my same year waifu hehe
comments: *Because her name can be pronounced as "Sora" and "Ten"
**I doubt we'll ever see it tbh, but I'll take the many photobooks this attractive woman is on like this one that I reviewed

name: Asakura Momo
intro: From her idol group "TrySail" and later in Anime "PriPri Chii-chan" as Yuuka
description: I just want her as a friend who will light up my life, make me a genius (because she isn't**), and I want to cuddle her every day after work. Dakimakuras have nothing on this girl.
wantedLevelComment: Mostly because of rack, and I like everything else of her too tbh
comments: *I'll call her 1st photobook technically it even though it's under a thin shirt, as reviewed over here
**YouTube has clips about how she flubs on livestreams and sometimes can't control herself even in front of the camera

name: Endou Yurika
intro: From Game "Alternative Girls" as Mizushima Airi
description: She has a fashion style one would be proud of dating, and she has a lovely personality and voice. Even though I've only heard her in that one mobile game but what's not to like?
wantedLevelComment: If she would come back...
comments: *Wait, you and Mocho are only a day away??
**Retired as of end 2018 due to health conditions

name: Hidaka Rina
intro: Because she looks cute and sounds like it too, and later from Anime "Servant x Service" as Momoi Kanon
description: She's the cute girl type that everyone loves, but I just think she looks cute even after all these years I've known her. Later on I also found out she has a lovely personality too** so that's a plus. Our paths hardly cross in Anime even if she has been around way longer than many mentioned here.
wantedLevelComment: Purely based on looks
comments: *More commonly referred to as "ChanRina" for some reason I don't know, but it appears to be associated to how fellow seiyuu called her as such
**As seen from Internet video series "Ohisamagumi" with Hikasa Youko

name: Kouno Marika
intro: From Anime "Sore ga Seiyuu!" as Kohara Rin and Game "Alternative Girls" as Onitsuka Chiho
description: Initially it was due to her maturing over the years since her first starring role in Anime, and thanks to my friend who got interested in her, I've grown more interested in her ever since.
wantedLevelComment: Independent of friend influence
comments: *Member of idol music group "Earphones" created from Anime "Sore ga Seiyuu!"
**She technically did not appear half-naked in her 1st photobook despite the bath dip, reviewed here

name: Minase Inori
intro: From Anime "Sora no Method" as Noel, and later from her solo 2nd single*
description: Her singing voice has been impeccable ever since I gave her solo music career a chance, she is popular amongst production and fans, she is the definition of cute and has a loving personality in front of the camera. It's hard to not like this girl.
wantedLevelComment: Overrated 3D Anime girl equivalent
comments: *Music video of "harmony ribbon" is on YouTube

name: Natsukawa Shiina
intro: Probably from Anime "Sora no Method" as Komiya Nonoka, and then from idol group TrySail
description: From her lovely voice to that adorable face to that fantastic cry when she sings... She is the perfect video game-loving imouto*** I have always wanted. Period. An Anime voice actress who loves video games what more can I ask?
wantedLevelComment: IMOUTO BANZAI!! 6 stars if I can place it
comments: *She is more commonly called "Nansu", and her name Shi-i-na coincides with the number "417"
**She is more literary than we think, with her 1st photobook which I reviewed eventually getting a novel serialisation

***She is indeed younger than me, and I would love to play video games with her considering she does YouTube Let's Plays on things like that Harvest Moon remake which I bought the Japanese version and played because of her instead of waiting for the English version to come out

name: Numakura Manami
intro: From Anime "Dagashi Kashi" as Endou Saya, and later from her solo music career*
description: Her lovely personality and voice acting over the years attracted me. Add in her powerful singing voice and she is formidable. Her personality on camera is lovely too.
wantedLevelComment: Not the cutest face out there but I like
comments: *Her 2nd single "Climber's High" is her most impressive release in Klassic Note
**Married to fellow voice actor Osaka Ryouta

name: Tachibana Rika
dobComment: She may be new but it's
intro: From Game "Alternative Girls" as Meya and its official livestream series as a guest
description: Her bubbly personality in front of the camera is a rarity when she was new to the industry, and she has been lovely all around ever since. Anime roles not included in this judgement
wantedLevelComment: If you're younger I want us to be together
comments: *It's two photobooks worth of photos without her half-naked that kind of explains her age imo

name: Takahashi Rie
intro: From Anime "Sore ga Seiyuu!" as Ichinose Futaba, and later in "Karakai Jouzu no Takagi-san" as Takagi
description: Her bubbly personality outside of Anime makes me smile, along with her appearances in Anime and in her own livestream** makes her a popular girl all around. Naturally, I have to follow suit.
wantedLevelComment: Not the cutest face I've seen here
comments: *Part of idol group "Earphones" based on Anime "Sore ga Seiyuu!"
**She is hosting her own livestream sponsored by an online cooking website where she makes her own dishes, as much as she isn't good at it initially

name: Touyama Nao
intro: From Anime "KONOBI" as Imari Maria, and later from her 2nd solo single**
description: She is so cute, appearance and all, after getting into her voice and voice acting I've never said no to her cuteness ever since. (I refrained from watching Anime "Kiniro Mosiac" because I'm afraid I might die of her cuteness)
wantedLevelComment: I hardly know her but she so cute
comments: *She may be too cute to have such a photobook, or even have one
**Music video available as preview on YouTube, for Anime "Tsuki ga Kirei"

name: Uesaka Sumire
intro: From Anime "KONOBI" as Colette and Game "Alternative Girls" as Hiiragi Tsumugi
description: Her obvious rack drew me in, and everything from her cute voice acting** to her somewhat weak singing in her solo music career (to her love for Russia maybe) to her rather clumsy yet wild personality were just part of her fan package. The unbelievably high amount of images she posts weekly on the Internet are my daily fuel.
wantedLevelComment: Not exactly my type but that rack...
comments: *Refer to her photobook which I reviewed here
**I prefer when she uses her own voice or her being matured, as in Anime "Aho Girl" as Morals Council Chairperson

name: Anzai Chika
dobComment: According to sources it should be
intro: From Game "Alternative Girls" as Tendou Machi, and later in Anime "Araburu Kisetsu no Otome Domo yo." as Sugawara Niina
description: She may look normal in every aspect, but from her matured look to her jovial personality she brings about a very friendly aura and will totally make of a lovely drinking partner provided if you can pay for her drinks. I don't know enough about her to be honest.
wantedLevelComment: Purely based on looks and personality
comments: *More commonly known as "Chikape"
**She released a photobook though, for her 10th year as a voice actress; I reviewed it here

name: Fuchigami Mai
dobComment: We're not supposed to know but it's
intro: From Game "Alternative Girls" as Sylvia Richter and later from Anime "Assassination Classroom" as Shiota Nagisa
description: She is known for acting male characters, but it's when she voices females that shows out her best, in my opinion. Not talking about voice, she doesn't look half bad either. Her singing career** is really helping to improve her image on me.
wantedLevelComment: Not really my type but she is growing in me
comments: *More commonly referred to as "MaiMai"
**Most notably in Klassic Note is "BLACK CAT" where in the music video she cosplays as a cat girl

name: Hondo Kaede
dobComment: I keep forgetting it was only
intro: From Anime "Demi-chan wa Kataritai" as Takanashi Hikari, and later in Game "Alternative Girls" as Kira Sayuri
description: She is in the level of adorable that everyone will love in Anime, making her super popular around 2017 that somewhat died down. Outside of Anime, she has an active personality and shows enthusiasm in her job**, compensating for her (slight) imperfections in image.
wantedLevelComment: Hard to not love her but I hardly know her
comments: *Pronounced as "A-dey-chan", a short form of her name Ka-e-de

**She has demonstrated that by dressing up and creating custom merchandise for the characters she voices, as seen from "Demi-chan" event where she shows up as casual look Hikari and in "Alternative Girls" livestream series where she shows up in the T-shirt worn by her character that has never been mass produced as official goods

name: Isobe Karin
intro: From Anime "Just Because!" as Natsume Mio
description: Once you realise who she is behind Anime and know how lovely she is beyond everything else, you will not stop liking her, just like I did. She just needs more Anime roles though, been working on games and that idol unit may not be enough exposure.
wantedLevelComment: I need more reasons to like her more
comments: *More commonly referred to as "Karirin" but "Karin-chan" is also popular
**Part of five-member idol group BlooDye

name: Kido Ibuki
intro: From Anime "Subete ga F ni Naru" as Magata Shiki and Game "Alternative Girls" as Saionji Rei and Anime "Eromanga-sensei" as Megumi
description: Her tsundere voices are my fuel, and she is kind of cute. Despite her young age in the industry she excels in her roles and has a somewhat sloppy character and I like her for that somehow.
wantedLevelComment: The childhood friend I wanted but don't have
comments: *People like to call her "Ibuking" I don't know. That's how she came up with her Twitter account name, I guess.
**Part of idol group "everying!" with Yamasaki Erii
***Not yet, but I reviewed her 1st photobook without swimsuits here

name: Kitou Akari
intro: From Anime "Blend.S" as Hinata Kaho and Anime "Tsurezure Children" as Ijima Kana
description: Her voice acting might be overrated by me considering she's still rather new, but so far her embarrassment drew me in. Somehow her fear of horror amongst many things about her gives me a vibe unlike her genius personality**. The singing just makes her perfect imouto candidate now lol
wantedLevelComment: Not the best face out there
comments: *I reviewed her debut single here
**She was a part-time illustrator before she became a voice actor, and explained on TV on how easy it is to do it AND study in school

name: Kohara Konomi
intro: From Anime "Asobi Asobase" as Nomura Kasumi and earlier in Anime "Tsuki ga Kirei" as Mizuno Akane
description: She may have a temper, she may not be the cutest girl out there, but she is presenting herself as honest and as beautiful she can and I applaud her for that. Which also makes me like her that much more when she is in every cute role* of every other Anime.
wantedLevelComment: Very normal in every aspect but she is kinda cute
comments: *Most notable I've seen include Anime "Takagi-san" as Mina-chan and "Kaguya-sama" as Fujiwara Chika

name: Lynn
intro: From Anime "Demi-chan wa Kataritai" as Takanashi Himari and later in Anime "Just Because!" as Komiya Ena
description: Besides being uniquely Western in appearance (mix between American and Japanese), she has a really nice voice that leaves an impression despite not being in the spotlight. Over the years I just happen to remember her name and how well she performs. Outside of Anime is where she totally shines, as she looks like someone desperate trying to get a partner** lol
wantedLevelComment: I'm not that into her to be honest but sometimes she makes me tingle
comments: *If she will ever come up with one I will assuredly be mind blown haha you know what I mean
**See her Twitter and Instagram for alluring photos that will not disappoint

name: Nagae Rika
dobComment: She may be younger than we think?
intro: From Anime "Asobi Asobase" as Olivia and "PriPri Chii-chan" as Joe-kun
description: She's that cute waifu we all want. She loves to talk to her fans and she loves cooking too, so that's a plus. Sadly she isn't that interested in guys** it seems so that's quite a bummer lol why
wantedLevelComment: Pure cuteness even just standing there
comments: *More commonly referred to as "Rikachimalu", and exists in Hiragana and Katakana forms. According to her Instagram story, they represent intimate and casual forms of her nickname respectively.
**Due to hanging out with other female seiyuu in the industry, and with supposed gf Fushimi Haruka

name: Nagatsuma Juuri
intro: From Game "Alternative Girls" as Agatsuma Ren
description: She has the best overall package to love, and in her first impression to me she voiced someone who is desperate to love. What else can I ask for? Outside of voice acting she has a friendly personality, though not much is known about her even after all these years. Her weekly blog post on Sundays is a good indicator of her recent activities.
wantedLevelComment: If she were in more Anime roles I want us to be together
comments: *Thanks to one Muscle Miyazaki from Game "Alternative Girls" livestream series I can't forget this now lol
**Released two singles under retired music label ZERO-A, but you should've heard her character song in the only game I know of her

name: Omigawa Chiaki
intro: From Anime "Seitokai Yakuindomo" as Mitsuba Mutsumi, and recently in Anime "Bungou Stray Dogs" as Tanizaki Naomi and "Chio-chan no Tsuugakuro" as Nonomura Manana
description: She may not have many roles over the past decade, but you'll recognise her coarse yet lovely voice from a mile away. Her personality outside of Anime is even better than her roles, and as she gets older her allure presented from her Instagram photos attracted me to her more than ever.
wantedLevelComment: If she is the asserting type that might turn me off
comments: *Fans call her "Omichu", but I think she is too matured to have such nicknames; She has a Chinese nickname read as "Xiao Qian Ji" as in "Little Chiaki Princess"
**Do we need it though?

name: Oonishi Saori
intro: From Game "Eromanga-sensei" as Senjuu Muramasa, and later in Game "Dead or Alive: Venus Vacation" as Tamaki
description: This is another one of those "your friend's hotter than you" and being on the same video series as Minase Inori** it's not hard to notice a difference. Oonishi exudes a playful yet matured personality, making her an absolute talent outside of Anime***. Inside of Anime, it's when she potrays matured characters (see above roles) that makes her stand out.
wantedLevelComment: Her friendly personality shines through the darkness, quite a beauty too
comments: *I typically refer to her by her family name, but more commonly referred to as "Saorin"
**From live video series off Anime "Re:Zero" with Minase Inori "Minase Inori to Oonishi Saori no Pick Up Girls!" where they just hang around to chat in 10-minute videos
***Through several YouTube videos featuring her and Sakura Ayane's radio show where they just flirt around and win the Anime Radio Awards while they're at it

name: Oono Yuuko
dobComment: She may not be that young anymore but we don't know*
intro: From Game "Alternative Girls" as Beruru
description: Her roles do stand out to be very different from her in person, because this inherent cuteness flowing out within her is hard to resist. If she ever out-cutes her own voice in an Anime role I think I'll die of overdose. She is a really good definition of what kawaii is in Japan without even acting.
wantedLevelComment: I want her to be in an Anime that I can like
comments: *Someone please tell me she is still young, please

name: Oozora Naomi
dobComment: Very deceptive but it is indeed
intro: From Game "Alternative Girls" as Tachibana Naomi and later in Anime "Chio-chan no Tsuugakuro" as Miyamo Chio
description: Despite her age and late entrance into the Anime industry, she excels cutely in roles involving her Osaka hometown accent**, and even outside Anime she presents a bubbly personality and subtle awkwardness that is to love.
wantedLevelComment: Her existence makes me happy for being alive
comments: *More commonly referred to as "SoraSora"
**Examples I know include mobile game "Alternative Girls", and as Kanna in desktop video game "Dead or Alive: Venus Vacation"

name: Toyota Moe
intro: From Itou Miku (not featured here) and their idol group Pyxis (which I don't listen)
description: She's like that friend's friend who is more attractive than your friend lol (sorry Itou Miku). She is not as popular in roles though as she is somewhat new, but her roles do present her as being idol-like. Not that I've given any though. Without proper Anime credit I am refraining my idolism on her for now tbh
wantedLevelComment: Selfie fuel ranked right after Sumipe
comments: *I reviewed her 2nd photobook- NO I DID NOT haha

name: Waki Azumi
intro: From Anime "Blend.S" as Sakuranomiya Maika, and later in Anime "Midara na Ao-chan wa Benkyou ga Dekinai" as Horie Ao
description: Her many appealing selfies is proof of how good she can take photos alone, and I can't help myself but follow her. In terms of voice hers is not exactly unique but she is popular and she is seen in a variety of roles and she excels in all of them**.
wantedLevelComment: Purely based on looks at this point
comments: *More commonly referred to as "Ajuju", and I hardly call her Azumi-chan tbh
**She was a replacement voice in Game "Alternative Girls" as Mizushima Airi, taking over from retired voice actress Endou Yurika.

name: Yoshimura Haruka
dobComment: At last we know now it was*
intro: From Game "Alternative Girls" as Orimiya Yui, and later in Anime "Domestic na Kanojo" as Kashiwabara Momo
description: Her personality is lovely despite her really compelling voice acting using her higher pitched cute voice, so for me it's mostly how she expresses herself outside of Anime that make her stand out.
wantedLevelComment: Purely based on personality
comments: *Fans guess she's in her 30s, so maybe born in late 1980s- HOLY SH*T she is old haha
